entry.def: Biology is the science which is concerned with the study of living things.
The biology of a living thing is the way in which its body or cells behave.

example.ex: The biology of these diseases is terribly complicated.
example.tran: 这些疾病的机理极其复杂。

means.word_mean: 1. (biology) a scientist who studies living organisms
